name: create_asset_upload_job
description: Creates an asset upload job and returns its unique ID.

name.description: The name of the asset being uploaded.

tags.description: Tags associated with the asset, limited to 50.

thumbnail_url.description: URL to the thumbnail image representing the asset.

name: create_autofill_job
description: Create an asynchronous job to autofill a design from a brand template with input data.

brand_template_id.description: The unique identifier for the input brand template.

type.description: Specifies the required data type: `image`, `text`, or `chart`.

rows.description: An array of data rows for the chart.

data.description: A dictionary of data fields to autofill, where each key maps to a field object.

title.description: An optional title for the autofilled design, defaulting to the template's title if not provided.

name: create_comment_reply
description: Adds a reply to a comment thread on a design.

design_id.description: The ID of the design the thread belongs to.

thread_id.description: The ID of the thread to reply to.

message.description: The plaintext message body of the reply, with mentions formatted as `[user_id:team_id]`.

name: create_comment_thread
description: Creates and returns a new comment thread on a design.

design_id.description: The ID of the design to add a comment to.

message.description: The plaintext body of the comment; user mentions must follow the `[user_id:team_id]` format.

assignee_id.description: Optional ID of the user to assign the comment to; the assigned user must be mentioned in the comment message.

name: create_design
description: Creates a new design with a specified design type, asset, and title.

design_type.description: A dictionary specifying the design type, where the key `preset` accepts values: `doc`, `whiteboard`, `presentation`, `canvas`, `banner`, `flyer`, `social`, `video`, `infographic`, or `poster`.

asset_id.description: The non-empty string ID of the asset (e.g., image) to include in the design.

title.description: The design's title, which must be 1–255 characters.

name: create_design_export_job
description: Creates a design export job for a specified design ID with export format options and returns the job details.

design_id.description: The required ID of the design to export.

format.description: A dictionary specifying export format options.

type.description: A required export type, chosen from "pdf", "jpg", "png", "pptx", "gif", or "mp4".

quality.description: Compression quality for JPGs (an integer from 1 to 100) or resolution and orientation for MP4s (e.g., `horizontal_480p`).

pages.description: A list of 1-based page numbers to export.

export_quality.description: Export quality level, either `regular` or `pro`; defaults to `regular`.

size.description: Paper size for PDFs, accepting "a4", "a3", "letter", or "legal".

width.description: Width in pixels, ranging from 40 to 25000.

lossless.description: Exports PNGs without compression if True; defaults to True.

transparent_background.description: For PNG, enables transparency if True. Default: False.

as_single_image.description: If True, exports multipage designs as a single image; defaults to False.

name: create_design_import_job
description: Creates a design import job from a file upload.

title_base64.description: A Base64-encoded string for the design title, limited to 50 characters before encoding.

name: create_folder
description: Creates a new folder with the specified name and parent.

name.description: The name of the new folder, limited to 1-255 characters.

parent_folder_id.description: The ID of the parent folder, limited to 1–50 characters.

name: create_url_design_import_job
description: Creates a design import job using a public URL.

title.description: The title for the imported design, between 1 and 255 characters.

url.description: The required, publicly accessible file URL (1–2048 characters).

mime_type.description: The file's MIME type (1–100 characters); auto-detected if not provided.

name: delete_asset
description: Deletes an asset by its ID.

asset_id.description: The ID of the asset to delete.

name: delete_folder
description: Deletes a folder and all its contents recursively.

folder_id.description: ID of the folder to delete.

name: get_asset
description: Retrieve metadata for a specific asset by its ID.

asset_id.description: The ID of the asset to retrieve.

name: get_asset_upload_job
description: Retrieves the status and result of an asset upload job.

job_id.description: The ID of the asset upload job.

name: get_autofill_job
description: Retrieves the status and results of an autofill job by its ID.

job_id.description: The ID of the autofill job to retrieve.

name: get_brand_template
description: Retrieve a brand template by its ID.

brand_template_id.description: The ID of the brand template.

name: get_brand_template_dataset
description: Retrieves the dataset definition for a brand template, detailing autofill data field names and their accepted types if present.

brand_template_id.description: The string ID of the brand template.

name: get_comment_reply
description: Retrieves a specific reply from a thread on a design.

thread_id.description: The thread ID to which the reply belongs.

reply_id.description: The ID of the reply to retrieve.

name: get_comment_thread
description: Retrieves a specific comment thread from a design.

thread_id.description: The ID of the thread to retrieve.

name: get_current_user
description: Retrieve team-related user information by user ID.

name: get_current_user_profile
description: Retrieve profile data for the specified user ID.

name: get_design
description: Retrieves metadata for a specified design ID.

design_id.description: A non-empty string representing the design's ID.

name: get_design_export_job
description: Retrieves the status and results of a design export job.

name: get_design_import_job
description: Retrieves the status and result of a design import job.

name: get_design_pages
description: Retrieve pages from a design, supporting pagination.

design_id.description: The ID of the design to retrieve pages from.

offset.description: The 1-based index of the first page to return, defaulting to 1, with values ranging from 1 to 500.

limit.description: The number of pages to return, defaulting to 50, with a range of 1 to 200.

name: get_folder
description: Retrieves metadata for a specific folder.

folder_id.description: ID of the folder to retrieve.

name: get_url_design_import_job
description: Retrieve URL import job status and result.

job_id.description: The ID of the URL import job.

name: list_brand_templates
description: List brand templates with optional filters and sorting.

query.description: Search term to filter brand templates by title.

continuation.description: A token for pagination, currently unused.

ownership.description: An ownership filter, one of 'any', 'owned', or 'shared'.

sort_by.description: Specifies the sort order, such as 'relevance' or 'modified_descending'.

dataset.description: Filters by dataset presence, accepting 'any', 'non_empty', or 'empty'.

name: list_comment_replies
description: List replies from a specific thread on a design.

limit.description: Maximum number of replies to return, ranging from 1 to 100 (default: 50).

name: list_designs
description: Lists user-owned and shared designs, optionally filtered and sorted.

query.description: A search term to filter designs by title, with a maximum length of 255 characters.

ownership.description: The ownership filter for designs, valid values are 'any', 'owned', or 'shared'; defaults to 'any'.

sort_by.description: Specifies the sort order, choosing from "relevance", "modified_descending", "modified_ascending", "title_descending", or "title_ascending". Defaults to "relevance".

name: list_folder_items
description: Lists folders, designs, and images within a specified folder.

folder_id.description: The folder ID for listing items.

item_types.description: A comma-delimited list of item types to filter by, allowing 'folder', 'design', or 'image'.

sort_by.description: A field to sort results, with valid values: "created_ascending", "created_descending", "modified_ascending", "modified_descending" (default), "title_ascending", and "title_descending".

continuation.description: A token for retrieving the next page of paginated results.

name: update_asset
description: Updates an existing asset's metadata, returning `True` for success or `False` if not found.

asset_id.description: The ID of the asset to update.

name.description: New name for the asset (max 50 characters).

tags.description: A new list of tags for the asset, with a maximum of 50 tags.

name: update_folder
description: Updates the name of a folder and its modification timestamp.

folder_id.description: ID of the folder to update.

name.description: The new name for the folder, between 1 and 255 characters.
